Reviews.Title: Horrible.
Reviews.Author: lmc
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my child's birthday and it quit working the next day.  It will not charge or anything.  And they wouldn't let me return it.

Reviews.Title: overall happy
Reviews.Author: suzy jeck
Reviews.Content: Works great. Ordered in purple came in green but my daughter was still happy with it so I'm happy. I think the original design flaw was the charger but this refurbished one has a totally different charger than our first one which we purchased elsewhere new and died within a day and would not charge. Overall pleased.
